thread.section_title: The Inn At The Roman Forum - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Boutique, antique and five star service
thread.title_full: Boutique, antique and five star service - Review of The Inn At The Roman Forum, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Nickkobe
title: Boutique, antique and five star service
text:
After searching the internet for weeks I decided to stay at The Roman Forum, what a fabulous choice I made.
If you're looking for a upmarket traditional five star then maybe this isn't for you. This hotel is more attention to detail, very hands on and like to go to know their clientele.
The room was grand, and I also got a free upgrade upon arrival which made the stay even better.
The location is perfect, 5 minute walk from the Colosseum. It's on a very quiet street and I think Is the perfect place for a romantic city break.
